products.description: Complete CRM platform for managing sales pipelines, forecasting revenue, and automating sales processes. Helps sales teams close deals faster with AI-powered insights, workflow automation, and mobile access. Scales from small teams to global enterprises with customizable features and deep integration capabilities.

Customer service platform that unifies support channels, automates case routing, and provides agents with complete customer context. Enables support teams to resolve issues faster across email, phone, chat, and social media. Includes AI-powered chatbots, knowledge base management, and real-time analytics.

Marketing automation platform for creating personalized campaigns, nurturing leads, and measuring ROI across channels. Helps marketing teams generate qualified leads through email marketing, landing pages, social advertising, and analytics. Integrates with CRM for seamless lead handoff to sales.

E-commerce platform for creating unified shopping experiences across web, mobile, social, and in-store channels. Enables retailers to personalize customer journeys, manage product catalogs, process orders, and optimize conversions. Supports B2C and B2B commerce with AI-powered recommendations.

Leading AI-driven analytics platform that transforms data into actionable insights with interactive dashboards and predictive analytics. Helps business users and analysts explore data trends, make data-driven decisions, and share reports across teams. Integrates with Salesforce and external data sources.

Real-time customer data platform that unifies and activates data from multiple sources to deliver personalized experiences. Helps marketers and sales teams gain a single customer view, improve targeting, and make smarter decisions with AI-powered insights. Scales securely across enterprise data environments.

Integration platform that connects applications, data, and devices quickly and securely. Helps businesses accelerate digital transformation by automating workflows and enabling real-time data sharing across cloud and on-premises systems. Supports scalable API-led connectivity for seamless integration.

Low-code platform for building custom business applications that extend Salesforce CRM capabilities. Enables developers and business users to create workflows, automate processes, and deliver digital experiences faster. Supports integration with Salesforce data and external systems to enhance productivity.

Sales tool that streamlines the process of creating accurate quotes and contracts by automating pricing, product configuration, and approvals. Helps sales teams reduce errors, close deals faster, and improve customer experience with guided selling and dynamic pricing. Integrates seamlessly with Sales Cloud.

End-to-end revenue management solution combining CPQ, billing, and revenue recognition. Helps finance and sales teams automate quote-to-cash processes, accelerate revenue growth, and ensure compliance with financial regulations. Provides a unified system for managing subscriptions, orders, and revenue lifecycle.

Field operations platform that optimizes scheduling, dispatch, and mobile workforce management. Helps service organizations increase first-time fix rates, improve customer satisfaction, and reduce operational costs with AI-driven scheduling and real-time field insights. Scales from small teams to large enterprises.

AI-powered solution that integrates sales data to forecast revenue accurately, identify pipeline gaps, and provide actionable insights. Helps sales leaders make informed decisions, accelerate growth, and improve quota attainment with real-time analytics and predictive scoring.

Platform that connects IoT device data with CRM to deliver real-time insights and automate customer interactions. Helps businesses improve operational efficiency and customer experiences by leveraging connected device data for proactive service and personalized marketing.

Digital experience platform that enables companies to create branded portals, forums, and websites for customers, partners, and employees. Helps organizations improve collaboration, engagement, and service through self-service and personalized content delivery.

AI-powered digital labor platform that automates customer service and sales interactions across channels. Enables companies to scale personalized, efficient communication with customers using intelligent agents and pre-built skills. Boosts productivity and customer satisfaction with AI-driven workflows.

Unified artificial intelligence solutions integrated into Salesforce products to deliver predictive insights, automate workflows, and enhance decision-making. Helps business users in sales, service, marketing, and analytics improve outcomes with AI-driven recommendations and automation.

Appointment scheduling solution that simplifies booking and managing appointments across sales and service teams. Helps improve customer satisfaction by providing flexible, multi-channel scheduling options and reducing no-shows with automated reminders and calendar integrations.

AI-powered platform that drives operational efficiency for customer service by automating workflows, extracting insights, and predicting case outcomes. Helps service managers optimize resources and improve service quality with data-driven decisions.

Pre-built ecommerce storefront templates designed to accelerate online store launches for B2B and B2C businesses. Helps companies deliver optimized shopping experiences with easy customization, scalable global support, and integrated commerce tools to boost revenue.

Solution for building flexible, high-performance Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) to deliver fast, app-like customer shopping experiences. Helps businesses reduce operating costs and achieve faster ROI by enabling tailored ecommerce storefronts optimized for mobile and desktop.

Embedded payment capability that simplifies capturing payments across any digital channel. Helps businesses accelerate revenue collection and enhance customer convenience by enabling secure, seamless transactions integrated with Salesforce commerce and sales solutions.

Customer-first order management system that streamlines fulfillment across all sales channels. Helps businesses reduce costs, improve order accuracy, and enhance customer satisfaction by providing a unified view of orders from purchase to delivery.

Robotic process automation platform that automates manual tasks at scale to increase efficiency and reduce errors. Helps organizations accelerate digital transformation by seamlessly integrating automation workflows within Salesforce and enterprise systems.
